body: That's a very cool hack! See this file. If we can get it work for this zone then we can implement it to Honeybee. Here is an example that reverse all the glazing surfaces to look inward. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1wKh57E-s8zxWqRbdps21Z9MdBr*NLqRTT6UgJbcec5hd*Pm7scTlnWcQpzWh1KHyXeWMyoNwvfW7chgwJz12x7UXsj82lz9/flipGlazingInwards.png)
